name: FTB-modpacks.ch Server
author: runemaster580@gmail.com
description: Since the release of the FTB APP, FTB modpacks are now distributed through modpacks.ch. This egg was developed for support for modpacks that are distributed through this.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# FTB Pack Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server
fi

# Download needed software.
function install_required {
    apt update
    apt install -y curl jq dos2unix
}


function get_download {
    # if no modpack id is set and modpack search term is set.
    if [ -z ${FTB_MODPACK_ID} ] && [ "${FTB_SEARCH_TERM}" != "" ]; then
        JSON_DATA=$(curl -sSL https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/search/8?term=${FTB_SEARCH_TERM})
        
        # grabs the first modpack in array.
        FTB_MODPACK_ID=$(echo -e ${JSON_DATA} | jq -r ".packs[]")
    fi
    
    if [ -z ${FTB_MODPACK_VERSION_ID} ] && [ "${FTB_VERSION_STRING}" != "" ]; then
        # grabs the correct version id matching the string.
        FTB_MODPACK_VERSION_ID=$(curl -sSL https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/${FTB_MODPACK_ID} | jq -r --arg VSTRING ${FTB_VERSION_STRING} '.versions[] | select(.name == $VSTRING) | .id')
    fi
    
    echo -e "ID: ${FTB_MODPACK_ID} VersionID: ${FTB_MODPACK_VERSION_ID}"
    
    cd /mnt/server
    
    curl https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/${FTB_MODPACK_ID}/${FTB_MODPACK_VERSION_ID}/server/linux --output serversetup
    chmod +x ./serversetup
    ./serversetup ${FTB_MODPACK_ID} ${FTB_MODPACK_VERSION_ID} <<< 'y'
}

function cleanup {
    rm -rf serversetup
    mv forge-*.jar forge-server.jar
}

install_required
get_download
cleanup

variables.name: FTB Pack search term
variables.description:
the search term for finding the modpack. needs to be at least 4 characters long.
Find out what term is needed by using the ftb app and searching with the term. make sure it only returns 1 result.
can also be searched for via: https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/search/8?term={SEARCHTERM}

only needed if the modpack id and modpack version id is unknown.

variables.name: FTB modpack ID
variables.description:
The FTB Api modpack ID.
Needed if not using the search variable

Example: FTB Interactions ID is 5.
https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/5

variables.name: FTB Pack Version
variables.description: what version of the modpack to install. leave empty if using the modpack version id variable.

variables.name: FTB Pack Version ID
variables.description:
The modpack api version ID.
needed if not using the string for the version.

Example FTB Revelations version id for version "2.0.2" is 86.
which would come out as: https://api.modpacks.ch/public/modpack/5/86
